en.name: Edge Imp Assist
en.effect: Each of the following effects can be used once per Duel.● Send 1 "Edge Imp" monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Change 1 "Polymerization" in your hand to "Frightfur Fusion."● Send 1 "Edge Imp" monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Send 1 "Edge Imp" monster from your Deck to the Graveyard.
